0: The takeover, the break's over, nigga
2: Hey lil soldier, you ain't ready for war
4: It's like bringing a knife to a gunfight, pen to a test
5: Your chest in the line of fire with your thin-ass vest
6: You bringing them boys to men, how them boys gonna win?
7: This is grown man B.I., get you rolled into triage, bi-atch
8: Your reach ain't long enough, dunny
9: Your peeps ain't strong enough, fucker
10: Roc-A-Fella is the army, better yet the navy
11: Niggas'll kidnap your babies, spit at your lady
12: We bring knife to fistfight, kill your drama
13: We kill you motherfucking ants with a sledgehammer
14: Don't let me do it to you, dunny, cause I overdo it
15: So you won't confuse it with "just rap music"
16: I don't care if you Mobb Deep, I hold triggers to crews
17: You little fuck, I got money stacks bigger than you
18: When I was pushing weight, back in '88
19: You was a ballerina, I got the pictures, I seen ya
20: Then you dropped "Shook Ones," switched your demeanour
21: Well, we don't believe you, you need more people
22: Roc-A-Fella, students of the game, we passed the class cause
23: Nobody can read you dudes like we do
24: Don't let em gas you, like "Jigga is ass and won't clap you"
25: Trust me on this one, I'll detach you
26: Mind from spirit, body from soul
27: They'll have to hold a mass, put your body in a hole
28: No, you're not on my level get your brakes tweaked
29: I sold what your whole album sold in my first week
30: You guys don't want it with Hov
31: Ask Nas, he don't want it with Hov, no!
32: I know you missing Nas the (fame)
33: But along with celebrity comes about 70 shots to your frame, nigga
35: You's the fag model for Karl Kani, Esco ads
36: Went from Nasty Nas to Esco's trash
37: Had a spark when you started but now you're just garbage
38: Fell from "top 10" to "not mentioned at all"
39: To your bodyguard's "Oochie Wally"'s verse better than yours
40: Matter of fact you had the worst flow on the whole fucking song
41: But I know: the sun don't shine, then son don't shine
42: That's why your (lame) career's come to an end
43: It's only so long fake thugs can pretend
45: You witnessed it from your folks' pad
46: You scribbled it in your notepad and created your life
47: I showed you your first TEC (me!), on tour with Large Professor
48: Then I heard your album about your TEC on the dresser
49: So yeah, I sampled your voice, you was using it wrong
50: You made it a hot line, I made it a hot song
51: And you ain't get a coin, nigga, you was getting fucked then
52: I know who I paid, God - Serchlite publishing
54: You said you've been in this 10, I've been in it 5
67: What you trying to kick, knowledge?
68: You niggas gonna learn to respect the king
69: Don't be the next contestant on that Summer Jam screen
70: Because you-know-who did you-know-what with you-know-who
71: But let's keep that between me and you (for now)
72: A wise man told me don't argue with fools
73: Cause people from a distance can't tell who is who
74: So stop with that childish shit, nigga I'm grown
75: Please leave it alone - don't throw rocks at the throne
76: Do not bark up that tree, that tree will fall on you
77: I don't know why your advisers ain't forewarn you
78: Please, not Jay, he's not for play
79: I don't slack a minute, all that thug rapping and gimmicks
80: I will end it, all that yapping be finished
81: You are not deep, you made your bed now sleep
82: Don't make me expose you to them folks that don't know you
83: Nigga I know you well, all the stolen jew-els
85: You can't fuck with me - go play somewhere, I'm busy
86: And all you other cats throwing shots at Jigga
87: You only get half a bar - fuck y'all niggas
title: Takeover
